title: v2 SEX Schema
description: JSON Schema for v2 SEX ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the v2 SEX ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet-v2-0001.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
